snippet: While restrictions on the use of social networks by Iranians remain in place, Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif spoke openly on state television about his love of Twitter banter.
abstract: While restrictions on the use of social networks by Iranians remain in place, Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif spoke openly on state television about his love of Twitter banter.

headline.main: Iran's Foreign Minister Discusses Twitter, Netanyahu and Kerry on State Television
